mapper.insert: insert into mainfeed (update_date, update_time,is_public, main_text, normal_tag,is_deleted,user_idx,emote_idx,emote_color_idx,feed_hit) values(curdate(), curtime(), #{isPublic} , #{mainText}, #{normalTag}, 0, #{userIdx}, #{emoteIdx},#{emoteColorIdx},0)
mapper.select: select f.feed_idx, u.nickname,f.update_date, (select count(*) from feedcomment c, mainfeed f where c.feed_idx= f.feed_idx )as 'commentCount', (select like_count from feedlike l, mainfeed f where f.feed_idx=l.feed_idx and l.like_type=1) as 'likeCount', (select like_count from feedlike l, mainfeed f where f.feed_idx=l.feed_idx and l.like_type=2) as 'cheerupCount', (select like_count from feedlike l, mainfeed f where f.feed_idx=l.feed_idx and l.like_type=3) as 'sadCount' from mainfeed f, mainuser u where f.is_deleted!=1 and f.feed_idx=#{feedIdx} and f.user_idx=u.user_idx ;
